member.name: M:Milvasoft.FileOperations.Abstract.IJsonOperations.AddContentAsync``1(``0,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Adds to json file in .

remarks.para: This method supports only structure 2 in class remarks.
Don't send as . You can use overload.
If content has "Id" property which type is "System.Int32" . Send param "true". The code will be increase Id automatically.
This method reads all file. This can cause performance impact with big files.

member.param: Content to be added.
Path to json file to get data from.
Determines whether the contents are added in auto increment by "Id" property.

Throwns when json file in not contains .

member.name: M:Milvasoft.FileOperations.Concrete.FormFileOperations.Combine(System.String[])
member.summary: Basically a Path.Combine for URLs. Ensures exactly one '/' separates each segment,and exactly on '&' separates each query parameter. URL-encodes illegal characters but not reserved characters.
member.param: URL parts to combine.

member.name: M:Milvasoft.FileOperations.Concrete.FormFileOperations.EncodeIllegalCharacters(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: URL-encodes characters in a string that are neither reserved nor unreserved. Avoids encoding reserved characters such as '/' and '?'. Avoids encoding '%' if it begins a %-hex-hex sequence (i.e. avoids double-encoding).
member.param: The string to encode.
If true, spaces will be encoded as + signs. Otherwise, they'll be encoded as %20.

member.name: M:Milvasoft.FileOperations.Concrete.FormFileOperations.IllegalCharsRegex
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(.*?)((%[0-9A-Fa-f]{2})|$)
Explanation:
1st capture group.
Match a character other than '\n' lazily any number of times.
2nd capture group.
Match with 2 alternative expressions, atomically.
3rd capture group.
Match '%'.
Match a character in the set [0-9A-Fa-f] exactly 2 times.
Match if at the end of the string or if before an ending newline.

member.summary: Adds to json file in .

remarks.para: This method supports only structure 2 in class remarks.
Don't send as . You can use overload.
